title: Monorflair
text: Monorflair spends his time studying in Germany. He is presently in middleschool in one of the best schools in Frankfurt.

title: Monorflair
text:
Experience
Monorflair started coding in scratch since he was 6 years old and with python since he turned 9. His dad inroduced him to Quarto in 2024 and he has been trying it out ever since.

title: Monorflair
text:
Hobbies
He loves playing brawlstars on his phone and also Pokemon and Fortnite on Nintendo

This website is not finishedx x

title: Brawlstars
text:
Your ultimate source for Brawl Stars strategies, updates, and community.


Clancy has the highest win rate at 67.3%. Starting Brawler:



Class: Starting Brawler Description: Shelly is a balanced brawler with a wide-range shotgun attack. She excels at close-to-medium range combat, with her spread attack hitting multiple targets. Super Ability: Shelly’s super unleashes a powerful blast that can break walls and push enemies back.





Class: Rare Brawler Description: Nita is a versatile fighter who summons a bear to assist her in combat. She attacks with shockwaves that can hit multiple enemies in a straight line. Super Ability: Nita’s super summons a bear that chases enemies and deals melee damage, making her a powerful force in close-quarters combat.



Class: Rare Brawler Description: Colt fires a barrage of long-range bullets, dealing significant damage over time if he can land multiple hits. He has great range but needs to be precise with his shots. Super Ability: Colt’s super fires a rapid stream of bullets that pierces through walls and enemies, making him a formidable damage dealer.



Class: Rare Brawler Description: Bull is a tough, close-range brawler with high health and a powerful shotgun. He excels at tanking damage and charging into fights, where he can deal massive damage up close. Super Ability: Bull’s super allows him to charge forward, breaking walls and damaging enemies in his path.



Class: Rare Brawler Description: El Primo is a tanky melee brawler with high health and strong punches. He thrives in close combat, where his attacks deal considerable damage. Super Ability: El Primo leaps into the air and slams down, dealing damage and knocking enemies away.



Class: Rare Brawler Description: Poco is a support brawler who attacks with soundwaves from his guitar. His attacks have a wide range and can hit multiple enemies. Super Ability: Poco’s super heals himself and nearby allies, making him an excellent support character in team fights.






Class: Super rare Brawler Description: 8-Bit is a slow-moving brawler with a high-damage laser attack. He has high health and great range, making him a solid damage dealer, but his slow speed can be a drawback. Super Ability: 8-Bit places a damage-boosting turret that increases the damage output of nearby allies.



Class: Super Rare Brawler Description: Rico fires bouncy bullets that ricochet off walls and hit enemies in tricky angles. His ability to hit opponents around corners makes him a unique and challenging brawler to play. Super Ability: Rico’s super unleashes a flurry of bouncing bullets that can cover a wide area and damage multiple enemies.



Class: Super Rare Brawler Description: Darryl is a tanky, shotgun-wielding brawler who excels in close-range combat. His high health makes him a great initiator for fights. Super Ability: Darryl’s super is a rolling attack that allows him to quickly close the distance between him and his enemies, damaging anyone in his path.



Class: Super Rare Brawler Description: Dynamike is a long-range brawler who throws dynamite sticks that explode after a short delay, dealing area damage. He excels at controlling large spaces with his explosive attacks. Super Ability: Dynamike’s super is a massive barrel of TNT that deals heavy damage in a large area, capable of destroying walls and enemy cover.



Class: Super Rare Brawler Description: Jessie is a versatile brawler who uses an energy orb that bounces between enemies. Her attacks can deal damage to multiple targets if positioned correctly. Super Ability: Jessie’s super summons a turret that shoots at enemies, providing additional firepower and support.






Class: Epic Brawler Description: Bo is a ranged attacker with explosive arrows. He has medium health and high attack potential. His arrows explode on impact, covering a wide area and damaging multiple enemies. Super Ability: Bo lays down hidden mines that explode when enemies step on them, making him great for area control.



Class: Epic Brawler Description: Edgar is a fast, close-range brawler with a lifesteal mechanic. His punches allow him to recover some health with each hit. Super Ability: Edgar’s super lets him jump over obstacles and enemies, allowing him to close the gap and engage enemies quickly.






Class: Mythic Brawler Description: Tara throws cards that spread out in a cone, dealing damage to all enemies they hit. She can hit multiple targets at once, making her great for dealing with groups. Super Ability: Tara’s super pulls enemies toward the center of a black hole, grouping them together for follow-up attacks from her or her teammates.



Class: Mythic Brawler Description: Fang is a martial artist brawler who throws sneakers as projectiles if he misses his kick. Super Ability: Fang performs a flying kick towards the nearest enemy, allowing him to quickly close distances and initiate combat.



Class: Mythic Description: Mortis is a dash-based brawler who attacks by dashing forward with his shovel. He’s highly mobile and excels at ambushing and finishing off low-health enemies. Super Ability: Mortis swings his shovel in a wide arc, dealing damage and healing himself for each enemy hit.



Class: Mythic Brawler Description: Gene fires a split attack that deals high damage at close range and spreads out at long range. He’s versatile and can adapt to different situations. Super Ability: Gene launches a magical hand that pulls a single enemy towards him, great for isolating targets.



Class: Mythic Brawler Description: Max is a speedy brawler who fires a rapid stream of energy blasts. She excels at harassing enemies and can boost her team’s speed. Super Ability: Max’s super increases the movement speed of herself and nearby allies for a short duration.






Description: Spike is a ranged brawler with a cactus grenade attack that explodes and releases spikes in all directions. His attacks are great for area control and damaging grouped-up enemies. Super Ability: Spike throws a slowing, damaging field that hinders enemy movement and deals damage over time.



Description: Crow is a fast, ranged brawler who throws daggers coated in poison, dealing damage over time. His attacks are great for weakening enemies and forcing them to play more cautiously. Super Ability: Crow jumps into the air and throws a barrage of poison daggers, dealing damage upon landing and spreading poison to nearby enemies.



Description: Leon is a stealthy assassin, known for his fast movement and ability to turn invisible. His main attack throws out spinning blades in a wide cone, dealing more damage the closer they are to the target. Super Ability: Leon’s super allows him to become invisible for a few seconds, making him difficult to track and allowing for surprise attacks.



Description: Sandy throws sand in a wide arc, piercing through enemies and dealing damage over time. He excels at controlling large areas of the battlefield. Super Ability: Sandy creates a large sandstorm that makes all allies inside it invisible, great for team-wide stealth plays.



Description: Amber is a fire-based brawler who sprays flames in a continuous stream. She can ignite oil puddles on the ground for area denial. Super Ability: Amber pours a large puddle of oil on the ground, which she can ignite to create a massive area of fire damage.



Description: Meg starts each match in her mech from where she does a lot of damage and has a lot of health, but when you break her mech she enters her basic form where she has bad health bad damage but long range. Super Ability: Meg calls down and enters her mech, but if she already in her mech her super makes her mech swing it’s arm damaging all oponents in it’s way.



Description: Draco thrusts his lance forward, piercing and damaging enemies in front of him, dealing more damage at max range. Super Ability: Draco enters his inflateble fire breathing Dragon and now burns his opponents, while in this form he has a 15 percent damage reduction and moves faster
